SELECT T.*, T1.ERR_NAME, NVL(WT.PALLET_NO,ZWT.PALLET_NO) AS PALLET_NO, NVL(WT.SLOC_NO,ZWT.SLOC_NO) AS SLOC_NO, NVL(WT.ELOC_NO,ZWT.ELOC_NO) AS ELOC_NO FROM Z40_CRN_FORK_ERR_LOG T LEFT JOIN PSB_CRN_ERR T1 ON T.ERR_NO = T1.ERR_NO LEFT JOIN WBS_TASK WT ON WT.TASK_GUID = T.TASK_GUID LEFT JOIN Z50_WBS_TASK ZWT ON ZWT.TASK_GUID = T.TASK_GUID
T.CRN_FORK_NO like '%'||#where.CRN_FORK_NO#||'%'
T.ERR_NO like '%'||#where.ERR_NO#||'%'
T.ERR_BEGIN_TIME >=#where.B_TIME#
T.ERR_BEGIN_TIME <=1+ #where.E_TIME#
ORDER BY T.ERR_BEGIN_TIME desc
